name: wrangler-weather
description: A simple web app to tell you how to drive your Jeep Wrangler based on today's weather conditions

scripts.dev: npm run build:css && nodemon --watch public/**/*.js --watch public/**/*.html --watch public/**/*.css server.js
scripts.build: npm run build:css && rm -rf _build && cp -r public _build && rm -f _build/input.css
